title: ASkyBlock玩家领取空岛不能破坏
author: 梦江南
txt_content:
ASkyBlock玩家领取空岛不能破坏
破坏一次就显示一次空岛保护
是怎么回事啊

replies.author: 水煮清娃
replies.txt_content:
尝试给予玩家基本的权限看看有无改善
askyblock.island.*
askyblock.team.create
askyblock.team.kick
askyblock.team.makeleader
askyblock.team.join
askyblock.intopten复制代码

replies.author: 叽叽小石头
replies.txt_content:
